metadata.name: Quartz
metadata.description:
MineleumNFT is the only NFT that can bridge crypto assets and reality to create new value.
The minerals listed on the NFT are real and can be exchanged for real at any time.
After that, the exchanged NFT also functions as a certificate.
Please check https://mineleum.com for details.

The owner of this NFT is free to use the images covered by this NFT except for commercial use. 
Copyrights, trademarks and other intellectual property rights are not transferred.
